short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will send suggested sites to The Still for curation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit URLs to the Real Estate Distilled community for curation.  A user clicks on the extension icon and the URL and title are sent to https://realestatedistilled.com where the data is collected and curated to be shared with the community.
